website_summaries.verdict: This wallet-friendly waist trainer provides a nice slimming look and is a cinch to adjust.
pros: A unique multi-functional option that serves as a total upper-body slimming garment – bra, trimmer, and trainer in one provides a sleek profile under clothing
Belt's Velcro closure is easy to adjust
cons: Some complaints of it not fitting larger women and being uncomfortable to wear when working out or during other rigorous activities

customer_reviews.title: I love this vest!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a XXL. I am 5'5, 180lbs, 38C bust, 33'waist, 43'hips. It's fitted around the bust area, but the material gives. Mine fits comfortably and i sweat a lot. Since the bust area zips and the waist is velcro, focus on bust comfort. I hope this review helps someone make a better decision and good luck!
customer_reviews.author: AM_customer

customer_reviews.title: When I tell you it fits perfect!, it does
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 5'11 weight about 275 pounds and bra size 40 D. When I tell you it fits perfect!, it does! It's kind of sung in the bust area but that is how it is supposed to be so they won't giggle while you workout. lol I ordered a 4X....I know it sounds way to big but its not and a lot of people tell me that I'am not big for my height.I also wear a size 18 pants and XL shirts. It will make you sweat like never before as well! I hope this helps because before I bought one I was looking at about 50 reviews until I made my final decision. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gelli08

customer_reviews.title: Product has good material and fit just right
customer_reviews.text: Product has good material and fit just right. I'm 5-4 140lbs, bust is a 34c and I ordered a small. The bust was a bit snug but it still zipped up and fit...I worked out with the product for the first time today and it did its job I definitely got a good sweat from it. More sweat than a regular waist trainer, even my back was soaked. I posted a few photos hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnee

customer_reviews.title: Super vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest is definitely a new staple in my workout regimen. Comfortable and trendy. The turso runs short and may not cover entire midsection. Runs a size small. I am wearing a 3XL and I am 5"5, 233 pounds. Also helps support your chest if you have large breast (no need to double your sports bra if you have this problem)
customer_reviews.author: Og.Ld

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this vest!! I am a 38 triple D and I ordered a XXl it is tight in the bust but not uncomfortable.. I work out and wear this to Zumba and my tank top underneath is soaked soo I get a really good sweat from this vest!!! would recommend it I love it I am going to buy another one in a different color so that I can have two!!!
customer_reviews.author: Latrice Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It fits great. I'm 5'8
customer_reviews.text: It fits great. I'm 5'8, 208 lbs and with a waist size of 36 and a 42DD and the size xl was a great size.. The top zipper was a little hard to zip up but once i got it, it stayed in place.. Working out, i had to get use to the tight pressure.
customer_reviews.author: shameka nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’0 almost 300 bra size 46B and I didn’t think that this would fit me at all from all of the previous reviews I saw. It fit EXACTLY the way it’s SUPPOSED to. It’s going to be a little bit of a hassle to get it on IF you have clothes on under it. It’s suppoed to be a little snug on you. If it was loose it wouldn’t work. It snapped me right in and even helped my posture. Doesn’t roll up. Stays in place during workout.
customer_reviews.author: Chiara

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: WOW! IT EXCEEDED my expectations! This is a really nice fitness vest. One of this caliber would be over $100 on another website! The material is very nice and stretchy and it doesn't feel like you're being suffocated. I am a size 18/20 and I got a 4xl. My cup size is a 42 D. It is a little tight in the breast area but I need that because I do not need them jumping around when I am doing cardio or jumping exercises. 5/5. Would buy again. Let's see how it does during my workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Zariah Cain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I was torn about what size to get according to other reviews. I ended up selecting the right size using their chart and it fits perfectly (taking into account I'm not very busty) if so I would have gotten a large vs a medium. I am 5'4 160 lbs. I'm hoping this will help shed fat on my upper back/abdominal area. Haven't worked out in it yet... but I would give the fit 5 stasr. It's study, well made and comparable to my sweet sweat sauna belt.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! I am really happy with this purchase. It does fit a little tighter on the chest area but it didn’t bother me because I felt like it gave me more support in that area. I also like the waist area because you can make it as tight as you would like. I would recommend this product. 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie vigier

customer_reviews.title: ... I ordered to the 2xl and the fit is great, it is snug on top but not too ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5"11 (closer to 6ft than 5'11) 165 lbs 38C I ordered to the 2xl and the fit is great, it is snug on top but not too tight so I can wear it with a sports bra or alone and still feel secure. The velcro is nice and secure. It's perfect for the sauna and just to wear as is.
customer_reviews.author: QueenGiraffe3

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart is off.
customer_reviews.text: The vest came super fast, the material is nice haven't worked out in it yet. I struggled deciding between L vs XL. I went with XL my measurements are 36DD bust 32" waist 5'6 160lbs. The bust area fit ok but not snug enough to where I wouldn't wear a sports bra for running etc. The waist part is to big to my liking and as you can see I can't make it tighter. The gathers around my back is from excess fabric. I hope the sweating isn't determined on how tight it fits. Will reorder a Large
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda W

customer_reviews.title: Hey its DENNESA JONES AGAIN LOVE ME SOME AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6 I wear 16-18 I got a size 4X it fit perfect...the suit runs small but I love it
customer_reviews.author: Nvida shilde

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product! Try it
customer_reviews.text: I order a 2x,however, they sent to a L😊 I'm glad they did! The 2x would have been to big for me! I end up ordering a 1x( cause the top part of the L was tight) but I don't like the bottom part of the of it 1x
customer_reviews.author: Rees

customer_reviews.title: Order up 2 sizes and you'll be okay.
customer_reviews.text: For years, I have purchased waist belts. Let me tell you that they worked. However, they only focused on my waist area and would slide down as I exercises. This one stays in place rhrough my harf training! I am SO happy I purchased this item! I usually wear a large, but, after reading reviews, I ordered an XXL. I am happy I did because it fits perfectly! The inside pocket is a great addition as well.
customer_reviews.author: jewimb

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to sweat!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I am 5’3, 240 pounds. My measurements are 42-40-50. I ordered a 5x. It fit just as I expected, slightly snug around my chest (as expected since my chest is larger than the recommended size) but it’s definitely bearable, and just right around the waist. I’m definitely happy with the feel and quality of the product. I haven’t had a chance to work out with it on yet, but after just trying it on for 5 minutes I began to sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Tianona

customer_reviews.title: Yes and yes again
customer_reviews.text: People give the must unhelpful reviews... This product is excellent however the midsection is not wide enough which is fine because I imagine as I lose weight my abdomen section will become smaller. The product I order was too big but that is solely because I ordered a larger size from reading the “customer reviews”. I am a 18 in women with a 46 DDD breast and I should have ordered one size smaller. That being said it is true to size. Over great product, comfortable, extends full waist front and back, seems to aiding in sweat production.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great fit..
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a vest that fits comfortably. I am a 42F and this fits snug on my breast but comfortable. I'm able to not wear a bra with this if I don't won't to and this keeps the girls and place. I received this next day with Prime.. Great product very happy with my purchase.. Will update once I put it to use..
customer_reviews.author: Imperfectlyperfect82

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I saw that there was really good reviews. I am 5 “4 and weigh 170lbs, based on reviews and the chart available I chose a large, it arrived on a timely manner, however it fits a tad large from my chest and I truly feel that I would benefit from a medium. I contacted the company, who provided me with great customer service and will be exchanging for a medium. I really feel that this is a good product and I look forward on trying out the smaller version!
customer_reviews.author: Afr629

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!! from a regular degular shmegular person!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5 and about 175lbs. I would consider myself slim thick. I can wear a medium or a large, for this vest I did get a large due to the other reviews on it. the large fits great and as expected. it is just tight enough, but loose enough for me to breathe. :) great buy! I bought another one for my spouse and she loves it as well! no I do not work for amazon or the company that is selling this, and unfortunately, I am not getting paid for this review. I am a real person with real life weight issues lol :) Great price, I would buy 10 times over.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: ☆ This Was False Advertising..It Didnt Arrive At Tha Tyme That Was Told 2 Me..Wasnt Even Tha Item I Paid 4..Didnt Even Fit Right...I Am A Small Wit My Otha Waist Trainers I Had, So Decided 2 Buy A Medium..It Doesn't Zip Over My Breast..I Even Laid Down Hoping It Wud Zip, But I Struggled N Managed 2 Zip It Up..I Didn't Sweat As Tha Item Explained It Was Supposed 2 Do...I very Mad That I Spent My Money On This Item N Cant Return Tha Item Cuz Tha Bag Was Thrown Away 2 Soon...Next Tyme Some1 Order Ur Item Make Sure Its Tha Item That's Advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Davis

customer_reviews.title: I love it because it fits under my workout clothes
customer_reviews.text: Definitely will make you sweat! I already see a difference in my waistline. Today will be my 5th time using it. I love it because it fits under my workout clothes. I think I will get a few other colors as well. People ask me what I'm wearing and I told them all about this vest. I hand wash it after each use and hang it up to dry for my next use. You don't have to wear anything over or under it, your choice entirely. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing was way to small, I ordered the biggest ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was way to small,I ordered the biggest size they had because of the reviews and it still was to small across the chest.wouldnt even zip
customer_reviews.author: Lateshia Roberson

customer_reviews.title: The XXX fit me perfect. It works well and make you sweat even ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 14-16 and with a 40DD bust size at 5'7. The XXX fit me perfect. It works well and make you sweat even while simply walking. Will recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Metrice Holmes

customer_reviews.title: It does make you sweat
customer_reviews.text: it does make you sweat, but I'am a small boob person, so when I ordered the size xxL I should of ordered and xL, but I also wore it under a plastic sauna suit, all i have to say is be very careful on your size, it may be really hard to figure out what size you really need. The corset does hold you in very tight fitting, hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Luvthisleo813

customer_reviews.title: This product does fit and run very SMALL! I usually wear a size Large in shirts but I had to purchase a 3X❗️
customer_reviews.text: I weight 200lbs and my braw size is a 40H. I purchased a 3X (XXL) I was so nervous about ordering this product because I thought it would not fit. However, it fit perfect 😍 Although, it is a little snug it is barelable. The product came fast 💨 The only problem I have with this particular product is that it rolls up. Hate that! Overall, it's not bad and was very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Sizing Issues
customer_reviews.text: This item was ordered in a larger size, but runs much SMALLER than specified. I cannot close the vest let alone zip it up. Sadly, it was a waist of money and I missed the deadline to return this item. I would love to exchange it for the correct size to be able to use, but it appears I just lost money on a bad investment for trying to incorporate a tool to assist in a healthier lifestyle and getting fit. This company needs to ensure the USA sizes are compatible to there product sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Tamaria swaggalicious_t

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: So I was kind of scared to order this vest because I wasn’t for sure if i would be selecting the right size so I just went for it selecting the last size(7X) and it fits perfectly it holds everything in while I work out
customer_reviews.author: LexP

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I wanted. I am full-breasted and very curvy in the stomach. I wanted something that would give me great chest support and stomach support. This product is it. I ordered 3X because I did not want to kill myself putting it on. I usually wear XL or XXL depending on the cut. I ordered 3XL, it is the right fit. I am 210 pounds 5' 3". I hope this review helps someone who cannot wear a sports bra or a sports bra gives little support, this product is for us!
customer_reviews.author: Ambi

customer_reviews.title: If you want to sweat..this is for you
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 6x and it fit perfectly. I wear a 2x shirt. I can't fit a t-shirt under it, but I didn't mind not having one on. I took an hour long cardio class and I was soaked. I mean my bra, the vest, and the shirt I had on top were SOAKED. I have had it about a week now and I have lost some inches (3days cardio and keto diet). I'm glad I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" and weigh 165lbs. I have 38C chest, 30" waist and 40" hips. The 2XXL fits great. I could have gone down to a XL, but I'm glad I didn't. I sweat buckets when wearing this vest. I just wish it had the neoprene coating inside that my sweat belt has. This is just fabric. Still satisfied. Zipper is good quality and velcro seems to be holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BRAND!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it! This is my 3rd time ordering from this brand. I ordered a Purple Waist Trainer (Medium) for myself. I used it with the 30 Day Fitness App on Google Play & have lost 40 lbs. I ended up giving it to my co worker since I had room in it. I also ordered my friend a Pink one and she love it. I order this item (Small) and it fits great! It came on its schedule delivery date in perfect condition. i will be using the 30 Day Fitness App in combination with this too so I can tone up and work on getting my abs. I cant wait!
customer_reviews.author: Youtube: MidnightAndI

customer_reviews.title: Get your sweat on!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 jeans and 36D bra. I wore mine for the first time today, I ordered a LG. Fits well just kind of hard to zip over my chest. Once it's zipped it fits and feels great. Doesn't ride up or slide down like previous vests I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4 181 lbs and a size 38 DDD so I purchased an XL..it fits comfortably in my breast area but not as snug as I would like in the back.. I’ve been wearing this garment consistently since I received it and it does increase the amount you sweat on your tummy and back area. It’s comfortable and the pocket is an added bonus witch I really love.
customer_reviews.author: Kissesfmhismrs

customer_reviews.title: soft comfortable neoprene fabric
customer_reviews.text: soft comfortable neoprene fabric, sturdy zipper, sturdy velcro. One thing to know is... the top section with the zipper is not attached to the bottom section in front. It is attached completely in back . This annoys me if I'm active and it opens a crack side to side. but not enough to be a deal breaker. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: emko

customer_reviews.title: I am highly satisfied. I’ve been searching for something to help me ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am highly satisfied. I’ve been searching for something to help me sweat ALOT while in the gym and assist with my weight lost. After searching and searching, my friend recommended this to me. I trust her, so i ordered it. At first, it was a big snug. I wear a medium/ large in women’s clothing. I ordered a large. A little tough to zipper but around the waist is adjustable. Today was my fourth day using it, and it has gotten easier to zipper. Besides the snugness gives me motivation to lose the weight even more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good vest for exercising definitely need to size up
customer_reviews.text: I tried to go based on reviews and I should have just trusted my own judgment as far as the vest doing its job it really does work it helps you sweat I have used it to even do things like chores around the house and do errands and it works as far as fit issues you best to go at least two sizes up from your original size. And even if that doesn't work you can always return it I decided against it because I want to make sure that everything was held in even though I ended up having a uniboob effect and the top part not really staying into the part of my chest.
customer_reviews.author: Phenomenally Me

customer_reviews.title: you have to remember that many of these like products are made in Asia
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to get this product at least two sizes larger than the normal size you wear. I normally wear a med to a large and had to buy the product in a 2x. Ladies, you have to remember that many of these like products are made in Asia. I lived in Asia for a year and did a lot of shopping. I was a few sizes smaller than and very fit. I know personal experience that you will have to upsize them anyway because their sizes are different from ours.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vest for your waistline
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’1 at 260lbs. I ordered a 4X and it fits snug. I wanted it to fit tight because I’ll know if I’m losing inches if it becomes loose. Love this vest. Makes me sweat especially when i use my abolene cream.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: It's a little snug but it's going to get the job done! I usually wear a extra large I ordered a 3X
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to fit tight because I wanted to be able to sweat a lot but it is a little snug around the breast part but overall it's going to be perfect. UPDATE : After wearing this vest on several occasions by itself doing a lot of exercising and with my job I'm moving o a whole lot. I expected to sweat like never before in this vest due to the reviews however I have gotten just the opposite and I sweat more with the sweat belt that I purchased from Walmart then I do with this vest! waste of money! but what's done is done
customer_reviews.author: THE COSMETOLOGIST

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been pregnant for the past 2 years in a row so i have that kangaroo mommy pouch we al dread and hate. I am a size 42D in bust and size 16 post babies. I ordered 3xl and it is a perfect fit. I expect the waist to close a bit more with use as i lose the weight but other than that, stong zipper and velcro, super comfy, sleek and trendy desing. Love the color. Overall i give this product an A+. Will definitely buy another obe when this one starts feeling big 😋. Great product guys. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Alma n Leo,T

customer_reviews.title: one of the great things about this item is you can unzip it ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits normal, however, I've got big boobs so the top is tight. But, one of the great things about this item is you can unzip it to let your ladies loose. The zip also helps when you run and don't want to restrict your breathing. I found that it goes all the way down to the hips so you don't have to deal with that annoying roll up that happens sometimes. Another benefit is if you have some blackheads on your back it helps them come out. This item is an A plus!
customer_reviews.author: ec

customer_reviews.title: Works but runs small in boob area
customer_reviews.text: This product is not made for women who have large boobs. I have triple D’s and I ordered the 5x thinking that it would be enough for the girls but boy was I wrong. It fits over them but it’s so tight I sometimes think the zipper is going to pop off. And the waist band is way too big because I had to try and accommodate the girls (boobs). But, it does help you sweat a lot and if used everyday while working out I can see how you would get results.
customer_reviews.author: Tan

customer_reviews.title: Go one or two sizes up. I went 2 up because of my breast
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5 my weight 232. I got the XXXL i wear a XL with everything else. I love this thing it fits well i wear a tank top under it to soak up all the sweat plus i put albolene on my body and i dont want it on my vest. I got grey and it looks nice. I have a gut so i weny with the XXXL and that works for me. I wear a 40DD and my twins fit inside of this and they come out soak and wet at the end of my workout and in the sauna. This company will see me again as i lose this weight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the vest and it exceeded my expectations. I will say that you must pay attention to the size recommendations. I wear it to all of my classes and whenever I'm exercising. My only regret is that I only ordered one unit. So if you looking to burn more calories, work up a sweat, and make you waist smaller this unit is for you. With the diet, exercise, and this vest weight loss is achievable.
customer_reviews.author: Mrssunshine

customer_reviews.title: Its Amazing! I love it!❤️
customer_reviews.text: On my upper body I wear a 2x so I decided to order a 3x but it was way to tight so I decided to give the 3x to my mom and ordered a 4x and even though it still Feels tight it’s comfortable though cause in all reality its obviously suppose to fit tight thats the whole purpose but for someone who wears a 2x I definitely recommend you get the 4x it’s tight but comfortable unlike the 3x it was tight but uncomfortable. Also keep in mind its kind of hard to zip up the bust area, some of you may need a little help from your friend/gym buddy etc other than that its a really good product!
customer_reviews.author: Shadaec

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help me enhance my workout experience. It fit the way I expected it to be. I really am not sure how it works with being a "waist trainer" as I have used this for a couple of months now and don't see that side of it changing. But I am still satisfied with this product. Ordering was easy especially when I had to choose the size. You will sweat a lot when working out! I love the comfort level it gives me as well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal's Book World

customer_reviews.title: 5'9 255lbs size 4xl
customer_reviews.text: This fits as it should considering my size. It does not cover my belly hang but considering it's a WAIST trainer I would not expect it to. My boobs (42D) are definitely squished a bit more than I would like but I can zip it so I guess that's fine lol I only just started wearing as it was uncomfortably too tight when I ordered it 2 weeks ago and I was 6lbs heavier and more bloated. I do keto so a couple weeks has made a big difference in terms of my stomach. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B

customer_reviews.title: Runs small READ REVIEWS!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I got a 4x because I read the reviews and since I have a 42 D chest I wanted to make sure it would fit. I got it super fast and was excited but it was a true struggle to zip up the “bra” part. The bottom Velcro part fits well and can grow or get smaller with me. The breast part though 🤦‍♂️ I don’t know. I’m going to try one more time to see if not I’ll have to return for a bigger one with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Keyonda

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fit like the first time you get it after a week
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold my breast (yes they're on the big side) but even then after wearing it for a few weeks it starts to rise up in the back and doesnt stretch back to the original form, it's suppose to be a7x but fits like a 4x but it deff didn't live up to expectations
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Duren

customer_reviews.title: The most valuable and luxurious item
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item yesterday and I absolutely love this item!! I think it’s the most valuable and luxurious item a woman can have in her everyday fitness life! I love this item because it fits comfortably I’m a 38C bust and my seller recommend 4xxl and it fits perfectly. This item also makes me sweat a lot excessively and this is perfect for detoxification. I advise all women of all color and size to get this item !! I hope this help someone who is having trouble to find your size Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in 2 days. I immediately tried it on and went for a walk. I ordered a 3XL. I'm 5'6 290, 42DD. I was able to wear it without a bra and it was comfortable. It fits as expected. I want to lose weight and still be able to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Kikelomo

customer_reviews.title: So unhappy Didnt fit
customer_reviews.text: I was so excite to begin my weight loss journey. My clothing sz is 1x/2x Ha! This item I thought by order a sz up too make sure it fit. I ordered a 3X When I tell you this stopped between arms & beginning of my breast THATS HOW far apart It did not even go across my chest And the waist wrap lol didnt even barely wrap.. Not sure what size would one order a 3X didnt fit a 1X or 2X person But if you don't have large breast It may wk! I'm a 40D
customer_reviews.author: a wright

customer_reviews.title: Fits weird
customer_reviews.text: First off, the sauna vest runs small. I got 2 sizes bigger than I'm used to. It fits amazing!!! Within minutes of putting it on, I was sweating. I only gave it four stars instead of five because since I have a long torso, the part between the waist trainer and the top part was very open. I have a long torso so it didn't fit length wise. But I'm still making it work because I love the way it feels and how it made me sweat so quickly! Would recommend to other people.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna Janicki

customer_reviews.title: Go a size up.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I also decided to buy a size larger. I am 5ft tall and 120 lb I ordered a medium. I'm a size 34 b in breast and the vest is snug. It fits me snug all around, but I fear that ordering a large would have been too large. The benefits of the vest being snug is that while running and exercising it keeps everything in its place and it actually facilitates my work out routine. Definitely go a size up
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected, tweaks will give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: you cant see the way the larger inner waist flap fits across your waist area, however it is not flat. The edges of the inner flap are rounded and tend to gap open @ the top of the waist right under your breast. Which lets in cool air & reduces the accumulation of heat in the front area. Also, I think the zipper could be placed on the side and sew in a bit of breast supports just under the breast area. Fits great, makes me sweat, for sure keeping it but just a few tweaks, updates, improvements would be wonderful. Jill-Health Enthusiast
customer_reviews.author: Jill Greene

customer_reviews.title: She will look 10X Hotter with this.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife because I obviously wanted her to wear it which she did. It is very flexible as you would not expect from a corset but it does hold well and still has that great look. My wife is 5ft tall and a 40 DD this fit her well with enough room in the back to adjust it several ways.It's a great product.The bonus the listing does not mention is the matching thong that comes with it. That was a surprise. I would not suggest it for everyday wear but definitely wear it often. I did received this discounted product in exchange for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I’m 280 lb and I order a 3XL in this product and I just knew it wouldn’t fit me BUT it does.. I love that it’s tight fitting as it should be so I don’t have to worry about any loose ends. I would recommend this to anyone I also use the tight skin cream when wearing it so it can tighten me up and sweat me out a little more I love it
customer_reviews.author: Chyna Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Good material but the wrapping part is small for me
customer_reviews.text: I Am 5.7" and 212 lbs . I got the 4XL and It is too short for my upper body, too tight on my chest and the wrapping covers 1/3 of my belly now. *I had a simple and less expensive thermo belly and it made me sweat much more. But, I'll keep this thermo vest. It'll might fit better after I loose pounds_ walking a hour , 4 times week is one of my New Decade resolutions 👍 Happy 2020 for everybody
customer_reviews.author: Silvia/FL

customer_reviews.title: GO AHEAD AND BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Ok after ALL the reviews that were written I am sooo glad I just went for it and bought it! It fits like a glove and it’s VERY comfortable. I am SO ready to work out in this. The support is phenomenal!! It’s not too tight around my breast.... it is just the RIGHT amount of hold AND to boot.... it came right away!!! Don’t overthink this purchase just go by the chart and you will be fine. Good product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackielajohn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I like feeligirl products. However this vest is hand washed and the first time submerged this in water it bunched up a bit. I bought another feelingirl vest from a different vendor and this never happened and I’ve had the vest for 5 years. The quality of the material is cheap. I’m very disappointed. I bought the pink one 5 years ago from a different vendor and the black about a month or two ago from this vendor and I wear both and wash both the same. It’s a significant difference in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Mine says 100% nylon
customer_reviews.text: I bought the L size in Rose Red design. Im 5.0 and 155 pounds and this almost doesn’t fit me. I think it’s because of my boobs, my bra size is 36D and all the area under my armpits hurt because is so tight. Now the belly area is fine because you can adjust it and this design have doble belt which is perfect. Anyway i should have gotten an XL size. The material does makes me sweat a lot without doing exercise, just by doing the normal things at home. I wasn’t going to wear it that much and hopefully i loose some weight...
customer_reviews.author: NinaYH

customer_reviews.title: You honestly do get a good sweat out of this product
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I go to the gym and I wear it religiously. I have lost about 5 pound using it. I am a 38C and I bought a large. The top is a bit tight and difficult to zip with another sports bra under it. You honestly do get a good sweat out of this product. I like that it has a little pocket in the front of the velcro end. I use it for my gym and car key and I dont have to worry about losing my things
customer_reviews.author: MissJ

customer_reviews.title: Love that it fully covers my breasts.
customer_reviews.text: Love the full coverage around the waste. But gives a bit of back discomfort because it's not fitted properly as my body type. Went off the sizing chart, but i believe the discrepancy lies with its design, in that it doesn't fully cover the under- bust area so part of it shows your skin under that area. Doesn't fully tuck into the stomach area. I believe that portion should be constructed LONGER on that area to be a PERFECT FIT.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole J

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it fits good and really makes you sweat the only thing I'd change is I'd love for it to come lower in the front and cover my whole belly but I'm a big girl, I wear a 44 F in bras so I just love that I finally found 1 that fits and does the job, I use it with sweet sweat and plastic wrap when I work out and by the time I'm done I'm full of sweat, just stay hydrated
customer_reviews.author: Shaquinda

customer_reviews.title: Have to return :(
customer_reviews.text: I just received my trainer and it's too big :(. I got a 3XL due to the bust. I am a 36D so I figured get it bigger. I am 5'4" 1\2 I weigh 198. I am petite at the shoulders so the straps were raised. The bust area zippered and I can tell has great support. The only issue I had was my waist. I almost completely tighten it which I don't want especially if I'm going to lose weight I want some room to move the garment. Also the smell of the garment is pretty strong. I want to try the product so I will get reordering and purchase a 2xl instead.
customer_reviews.author: STAYSHIA

customer_reviews.title: They sent the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed about the color. I ordered the army green color Which by the way I love . and they sent me some charcoal grey color. the color they sent me is not even up there as a option to buy. So that’s why I rated it 3 stars. it would have fitted me good if my torso was longer, I am short so it bulges at the sides it’s still workable. I’ll have to work out with it and give a update but the look of it is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Latasha

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: If I could give no stars I would. I was reluctant to order this for the fear of it being to small. I normally wear a 3 to 4xl, but I have a large chest so ordered what I thought would be 2 sizes larger a 7xl. What came in the package says 7xl but when I tried it on felt like a xl. My husband who is a 2-3xl couldn't even get it to close and he has no chest. Very disappointed with this purchase and I have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's a great best. I sweat every time I go to the gym. I'm happy to say, I am I need of another one since this has gotten too big (down 50lbs). At first, the velcro came undone but I think it was bc of my weight. Now it doesn't come undone at all. Since I have hips and butt, the best seems to roll up alot. I find myself pulling it down when I go to Zumba. That is the reason I didn't give 5-stars. I hope this help someone. I think I got a size 4x. I weighed 325 and it fitted okay.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Size runs very small
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a busty woman like myself a 5x would not zip up in the boob area at all. I had no issues with the stomach area. I am 42G and I could not zip up in the boob area. They need to make these in American sizes as well. They should also change the size chart. If they have a 7 x I may be able to fit that one, but 5x runs wayyyyyy to small in the boob area. Keep in mind I wear 2x in shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Lytisha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it out as soon as it was delivered, Fits perfect a lil snug like you want but not uncomfortable, i'm tall with a long torso so most sweat bands are not long enough for me but it fits perfectly. it didn't roll or needed any adjustments when doing intense workouts like burpees, mountain climbers, etc. Made you sweat every where the vest touched even hard to reach spots like love handles and underarm fat ;). my new fav workout compamion
customer_reviews.author: NISHEERA JEFFERS

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if your waist is small 20-25
customer_reviews.text: I got an extra small it does not compress i only had trouble getting the top part on but the bottom is loose which defeats the purpose very disappointed would love to have a refund
customer_reviews.author: Sade Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Okay I will say this... it does its job but I will say just like everyone else the seller needs to let the customers know the correct size for each body type! I went exactly by the chart they gave and well I’m not surprised... especially since everyone’s reviews are somewhat similar. The chest on my vest was extremely to big but the bottom fitted okay the only reason why I’m keeping it is because of the belt it helps pull me in. Overall the quality is great! You will sweat which is the purpose anyway! I would say GO FOR IT. Given the price... you can always downsize.
customer_reviews.author: Terneec

customer_reviews.title: Go one size smaller if you want snug fit
customer_reviews.text: The item is worth the money. Made very well. The size guide is accurate, however I like for my boobs not to move AT ALL while exercising (38DD). So buy one size down if you want the ultra snug. If not, then just use the proposed chart. I liked not having to wear 2 sports bras while working out!
customer_reviews.author: Denise McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: It rides up but....
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this is that it rides up in the back and I have to keep adjusting it while I’m working out. I got a 4X and it’s a bit loose in the chest (a size smaller would fit the chest best). But other than that it’s a great product. I always wear a tank top underneath and when I take the vest off, my tank top is always soaking wet.
customer_reviews.author: Latosha

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I am 5’10, 160lbs, 36DD. I ordered a large & it fits perfectly. I wear a sports bra underneath & it zips up in the chest area with ease. I’m trying to go down a cup or two. i got this item to particularly sweat in my chest & core. I have a hard time sweating no matter how hard a workout. This item has helped a lot!
customer_reviews.author: CMBRussell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I so 💜 this product and it does exactly what the description says it does. Just found out that my favorite celebrity uses this product on the daily and thats what had me to try it out. I wear it to work for 8hrs, workout with it on, do my daily activities & house stuff with it on and it still produces to shed sweat and stomach flattening. The best product by far
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Slow Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I've taken away another star because the back of the vest is so big that it bulked outward and doesn't even lay against my back. I also noticed that the velcro is lifted and not glued down around the edges. The back bands roll up/ down but it fits well and it was comfortable to work out in and delivery took FOREVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit for a Big Belly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" 240lbs 36DD. I ordered the 2XL because my midsection is large and protruding. The bust area fits nicely, just a little lose for me, zips well, and stays up the entire time I have it on. It does slide up a little in the back because I have a shorter torso than most and my butt is a high rise. Overall this is a great product and it makes me sweat! I feel more confident that I will get a better workout in with this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquih20s

customer_reviews.title: sweat burner!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a few weeks now. I like how it helps me sweat! I even put it on while cleaning the house and it helps me burn those extra calories. Great price for the vest and does what its supposed to. I've never put my cell phone in the little pocket though. Not sure that I would want to risk it getting wet from sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Erin G-H

customer_reviews.title: Order about 2-3 sizes up!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 3x in shirts... I ordered a 7x, since it does run small. its tight around the breast area, had to tug a little to get the twins in there, but it’s worth the money. It fits, I sweat a ton when working out... Anxious to see my results after using this for a while. And mine didn’t have a weird smell to it. Overall, I’m satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Monique Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best waist trainer - sweat device
customer_reviews.text: i love this thing. I dropped two inches in 1 week. (I was also dieting and exercising but without this, i wouldn't have been able to drop the inches) its comfortable enough to wear all day and if you make it tight enough you won't get hungry
customer_reviews.author: Allan Lauenstein

customer_reviews.title: 5XL did not fit my 44DDs
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 sizes up as suggested and also used my bra size 44DD to order a 5XL. Could not zip the breast part up (tried on with workout tank and no bra). I'll order the next size and try it but if it doesn't work out I'll return for a refund. The material felt great, stretchy, soft, and flexible. It is the only reason why I will try again ordering the 6xl.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: great, just not the right color
customer_reviews.text: This a great product that will make you sweat during your workouts. however it did arrive in the correct color I selected. I ordered it in the grey but got pink..I decided to keep it because I needed it for my training sessions. I would give 5 stars but because I didn't get the correct color I will give the seller 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: ytf

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. Order a size or two up
customer_reviews.text: It feels really nice. My boobs are kind of big so it's a little snug but from what I've seen it should be a little tight in that area. I would get a size up from what you normally wear. I am usually XL in shirts but I had to order a 3XL. The only thing I do not like is that it does rid up in the back. If I where to get a bigger size it would be too big. Other then that I love the fit and the color. It for sure makes me sweat a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn Reed

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Exactly what I wanted and needed!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and does exactly what it should! I’m 6’0 and 279 lbs. I read the reviews and went with the 4XL. Not too tight nor hard to zip up, you can wear without a bra if you choose but I still chose to wear a sports bra for extra support...trust me it’s necessary for soaking up the sweat too. My sports bra was soaked as well as the inside of the vest post workout. (The second picture shows the sweat in the vest.) This vest most definitely a great addition to a good workout, makes you sweat A LOT and gives you great upper body support.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! I ordered a 4x based off the reviews and I'm glad I did. Its a little big in the back but other than that its perfect. Btw I'm 5'5 and 200 lbs 38D
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely followed the sizing guide and it is waaaaay off. I'm guessing we should order 5 sizes bigger? Quality seems decent but the sizing suggestion needs to be more accurate. If you're thin then you shouldn't have an issue. I'm big breasted and made sure to follow the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Miss C

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and makes you sweat a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I wore it as soon as I got it and started to do some yard work. I love it. Very comfortable. Made me sweat a lot. Will definitely use often.
customer_reviews.author: LuNa

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it a five star ratimg.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a five star rating on quality alone. But it sizing is no way near true to form. I wear a 1x normally, so I went up two size so I could have room to adjust. It was still very tight almost unable to close. so great quality but the sizing is AWFUL. overall I like it just wish it would have fitted better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer satisfaction, should not had to pay to return item.
customer_reviews.text: The item was cut three smallest than it said. Instead of it being XL it fit like a small. Went to return item back to feelin girl and it cost me just as much to return as i paid for it, very dissatisfied with produce, will not order from them again. Very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for workouts except the Velcro keeps coming undone I think mine is defective
customer_reviews.text: Get ready to sweat your ass off. I really like mine although the Velcro part kept coming undone I’m pretty sure that’s not supposed to happen I even tried wearing tighter shirts to hold it in place but I don’t think the Velcro I got on my vest was as strong I don’t know how to ask for a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Stenger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of what size I should get. I have Large breast 40 H and I was uncertain if it will fit well. I do want to decrease the size of my breast, that is why it was important for me to purchase the correct size. The size I purchased is 2x and it fit well. Please understand my back is small however my breast is large, so if you have this unique problem as well, a 2x will fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This material is not breathable and makes you sweat like crazy. This item is cheap material and I don’t know how long it will hold up but I like that it has a velcro binding type waiste and zip up the boobs. The boob part is a tad small....I can only wear a uniboob type bra
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Elder

customer_reviews.title: Boobs too big
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a waist trainer that could fit my waist, only problem is the top doesn't zip because my boobs are too big. Thinking about cutting the top portion off or adding an elastic panel to the back for so that it can zip
customer_reviews.author: R. F

customer_reviews.title: I was so mad
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not for big girls that have you know the Muffin Top type of stomach and you trying to persuade all the way around your stomach and it is not for big girls at all just for to switch off your back if you were big girls but trust me you going to need extra free strips in the front is this is not it
customer_reviews.author: Britany m houston

customer_reviews.title: This worked out great. It fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sizes bigger than my normal size because I have a big chest. This worked out great. It fits perfectly. The great thing about it is if you do order bigger the bottom straps and you can make that part smaller because its velcro. So if you are big chested I suggest your order up and it will still fit.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Love this sauna suit
customer_reviews.text: Love this sauna suit... Im normally a L/XL 38c. I had to get this in a 3X. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: WChantel

customer_reviews.title: How it fits
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving 3 stars and a low on fitting because I ordered a large. After certain exercises like the pull-ups and dips, i notice it moves. The bottom portion crawls upward and doesn’t stay in place. The chest area moves also and I have to keep pulling it back in place. Overall it’s really help me sweat and I’m soaked after training. I just don’t like having to keep adjusting it and it slightly bulky.
customer_reviews.author: VEE

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SAUNA SUIT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Sauna suit!!! I ordered a large. I'm 5'5" and weigh 173lbs. I'm small chested (B cup) and my suit fits perfectly!!! This thing really make you sweat even if you're not working out.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

product_meta.title: FeelinGirl Neoprene Sauna Suit Tank Top Vest with Adjustable Waist Trimmer Belt
feature_bullets: High Compression,Firm Control.Reduce waistline up to 4 sizes instantly.
Zipper front closures.an ideal for a hourglass shape,excellent fit for short torso and normal torso body types
Neoprene Sauna Suit Tank Top Vest with Adjustable Waist Trimmer Belt. Excellent fit for short torso and normal torso body types.
